thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 11 of 40
thread.title: Nikki Fryn

author: Nikki Fryn
title: Nikki Fryn
text:
I spent some time getting familiar with the different espresso makers available on the site and watched a couple of videos about different machines.
I wanted a machine that would make great espresso without needing a university degree to use it and found all the info I needed to make that decision. I also learned a lot about what it take for a quality machine work well and last a long time.
When ordering online my credit card wouldn't work, so I got the sales department on the phone and they had the transaction completed immediately and the machine on its way to me within hours. I'm one very happy customer who now has a great latte available whenever I want one!
